QueryText:
pest management in rice
fertilizer recommendation
KCCAns:
recommended to place yellow sticky trap in the field , apply fire trap @ night times, spray quinalphos 1.5 ml @ 1 liter water @ morning times.
Fertilizer recommendation for rice = @ the time of planting 50 kg factomphos  , 10 kg urea , 10 kg potash,
25 - 30 days after planting 30 kg urea , 10kg potash 
55 days = 10 kg urea ,10 kg potash
